title: Clay: or the origin of the species
creator_credit: Eliot Noyes, Contemporary Films and McGraw-Hill Films
brief_description: An art film in which three-dimensional forms of modelling clay are used to express a visual and amusing variation on a theory of evolution as suggested by the simple lifeforms which emerge from graphic motions of a clay sea. Best Film, 6th Annual Annecy film festival.
